## An Alaskan Dry Cabin Original

I wrote this song while I was living on Susan Butcher's Dogsled farm. I was in college at the time and living in a dry cabin, that is, a cabin without running water. I will fondly remember my days living on Trail Breaker Kennel. It was right next to the airport and I became immune to landing jet noise.
